info.title: Adobe Analytics Data Feed API
info.description:
Adobe Analytics Data Feed API 2.0

 Note: Adobe may add optional request and response members (name/value pairs) to existing API objects at any time and without notice or changes in versioning. Adobe recommends that you refer to the API documentation of any third-party tool you integrate with our APIs so that such additions are ignored in processing if not understood. If implemented properly, such additions are non-breaking changes for your implementation. Adobe will not remove parameters or add required parameters without first providing standard notification through release notes.

tags.name: Datafeed API
tags.description: API to create, update and retrieve datafeed with a user token

tags.name: Manage API
tags.description: API for users to resend, reprocess and redo datafeed requests with a user token

tags.name: Column Preset API
tags.description: API to create, update and retrieve column presets for datafeeds with a user token

post.description:
**Required fields are:**

- feedName: Name of the datafeed
- rsid: Report suite String identifier
- columnPreset: Column preset identifier
- schedule.startDate: Start date of the schedule in ISO 8601 format
- delivery.cloudLocationUUID: Cloud storage location UUID
- delivery.notificationEmail: List of notification email addresses

**Optional fields and defaults are:**

- feedState: State of the datafeed [created, hold, active(default)]
- dynamicLookups: Boolean to enable/disable dynamic lookups [true, false(default)]
- replaceEscapedChars: Boolean to enable/disable replacing escaped characters [true, false(default)]
- schedule.interval: Delivery interval [daily, hourly(default)]
- schedule.delay: Integer representing the delay in processing in minutes 0 to 9999 (default=0)
- packaging.type: String representing the packaging type [flat, chunked(default)]
- packaging.chunkSize: Integer representing the chunk size in MB [1024, 2048(default), 4096]
- packaging.compression: String representing the compression type [zip, gzip(default)]
- packaging.manifest: String representing the manifest type [no-file, fin-file, manifest-file(default)]
- packaging.noDataManifest: Boolean to enable/disable no data manifest [true, false(default)]
- lateHits.enabled: Boolean to enable/disable late hits [true, false(default)]
- lateHits.lookback: Integer representing the lookback period in hours [0 to 26280 (default = 0)]

**Example 1 with only required fields:**

```json
{
  "feedName": "ExampleFeed1",
  "rsid": "example-rsid",
  "columnPreset": 1,
  "schedule": {
    "startDate": "2024-01-01T00:00:00Z"
  },
  "delivery": {
    "cloudLocationUUID": "your-location-uuid",
    "notificationEmail": ["test@example.com"]
  }
}
```

**Example 2 with required and optional fields:**

```json
{
  "feedName": "ExampleFeed2",
  "rsid": "example-rsid",
  "feedState": "active",
  "columnPreset": 1,
  "notes": "Example feed",
  "dynamicLookups": true,
  "replaceEscapedChars": false,
  "schedule": {
    "startDate": "2025-06-01T00:00:00Z",
    "endDate": "2026-12-31T23:59:59Z",
    "interval": "hourly",
    "delay": 100
  },
  "packaging": {
    "type": "chunked",
    "chunkSize": 4096,
    "compression": "gzip",
    "manifest": "manifest-file",
    "noDataManifest": true
  },
  "delivery": {
    "cloudLocationUUID": "your-location-uuid",
    "notificationEmail": ["test@example.com"]
  },
  "lateHits": {
    "enabled": true,
    "lookback": 1000
  }
}
```

400.description: Bad Request - Unable to create Datafeed.

put.description:
This endpoint allows updating specific fields of an existing datafeed.

**Fields that can be updated:**

- columnPreset: Integer value representing the column preset.
- notes: String field to add notes about the datafeed.
- dynamicLookups: Boolean to enable/disable dynamic lookups.
- replaceEscapedChars: Boolean to enable/disable replacing escaped characters.
- schedule.endDate: String representing the end date of the datafeed.
- schedule.delay: Integer representing the delay in minutes.
- delivery.cloudLocationUUID: UUID string of the delivery location.
- delivery.notificationEmail: List of strings representing notification email addresses.
- lateHits.enabled: Boolean to enable/disable late hits.
- lateHits.lookback: Integer representing the lookback period in hours.
- packaging.type: String representing the packaging type (e.g., 'flat', 'chunked').
- packaging.compression: String representing the compression type (e.g., 'gzip', 'zip').
- packaging.chunkSize: Integer representing the chunk size in MB.
- packaging.manifest: String representing the manifest type (e.g., 'no-file', 'fin-file', 'manifest-file').
- packaging.noDataManifest: Boolean to enable/disable no data manifest.

**Example request body:**

```json
{
  "columnPreset": 0,
  "notes": "string",
  "dynamicLookups": true,
  "replaceEscapedChars": true,
  "metadata": {
    "feedId": 0,
    "feedState": "string"
  },
  "schedule": {
    "startDate": "string",
    "endDate": "string",
    "interval": "string",
    "delay": 0
  },
  "packaging": {
    "type": "string",
    "chunkSize": 0,
    "compression": "string",
    "manifest": "string",
    "noDataManifest": true
  },
  "delivery": {
    "cloudLocationUUID": "string",
    "notificationEmail": [
      "string"
    ]
  },
  "lateHits": {
    "enabled": true,
    "lookback": 0
  }
}
```

400.description: Bad Request - Unable to update Datafeed.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Valid values: active, canceled and hold

400.description: Bad Request - Unable to update Datafeed status.

500.description: Error occurred while updating datafeed status.

get.summary: Gets datafeeds for a report suite

400.description: Bad Request - Unable to get Datafeed(s).

500.description: Error occurred while retrieving datafeeds for rsid.

200.description: Datafeeds for report suite retrieved successfully.

post.summary: Gets datafeeds for an array of report suite

400.description: Bad Request - Unable to get Datafeed(s).

500.description: Error occurred while retrieving datafeeds for rsids.

200.description: Datafeeds for multiple report suite retrieved successfully.

get.summary: Gets datafeed requests for a report suite and feed ID
get.description: If no dates are provided, the API will return the latest datafeed requests.

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Filters for Datafeed requests on or after the specified datetime

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: Filters for Datafeed requests on or before the specified datetime

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of records to return. Max value allowed is 5000. Defaults to 500.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Number of records to skip for pagination. Defaults to 0.

400.description: Bad Request - Unable to get Datafeed requests.

500.description: Error occurred while retrieving datafeed requests.

post.description:
This endpoint allows searching for datafeed requests using various filtering criteria.

The request body supports the following fields:

- rsids **[Required]:** One or more report suite IDs to filter the search.

- feedIds **[Required]**: One or more datafeed IDs to filter the search.

- requestStates: Filter by request states [created, processing, completed].

- billingCustomerId: Filter by billing customer ID.

- useUtc: Indicates whether the date filters should use UTC (default=false).

***Pagination:***

- limit: Maximum number of results to return (default=100).

- offset: Offset for pagination (default=0).

***Sorting:***

- sortOrder: 'asc' or 'desc' (default='desc').

- orderBy: Field to sort by (first_run_date, complete_date, req_period_begin_utc ).

***Date Filters:*** Dates must be in ISO 8601 format with timezone (yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssXXX) or UTC (yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ):

- minRequestPeriodStartDate, maxRequestPeriodStartDate: Filter by request period start date range.

- minAttemptDate, maxAttemptDate: Filter by attempt date range.

- minCompletionDate, maxCompletionDate: Filter by completion date range.

- minSubmittedDate, maxSubmittedDate: Filter by submission date range.

**Example request body:**

```json
{
  "rsids": [
    "inttest"
  ],
  "feedIds": [
    6, 7
  ],
  "requestStates": [
    "created", "processing", "completed"
  ],
  "limit": 10,
  "offset": 0,
  "sortOrder": "desc",
  "minRequestPeriodStartDate": "2023-05-21T08:00:00Z",
  "maxRequestPeriodStartDate": "2023-07-21T08:10:00Z"
}
```

400.description: Bad Request - Unable to get Datafeed requests.

500.description: Error occurred while retrieving datafeed requests.

put.summary: Redo a datafeed by request ID. It first checks if a resend is possible, if not, it reprocesses the request.

400.description: Bad Request - Unable to resend request.

500.description: Error occurred while redo datafeed request.

put.summary: Reprocess a datafeed by request ID

400.description: Bad Request - Unable to resend request.

500.description: Error occurred while reprocess datafeed request.

put.summary: Resend a data feed by request ID

400.description: Bad Request - Unable to resend request.

500.description: Error occurred while resending datafeed request.
Error occurred while retrieving all columns

404.description: Column Presets for report suite not found.

400.description: Bad Request - Unable to create Column Preset.

500.description: Error occurred while creating column preset.

200.description: Column Presets for report suite created successfully.

get.summary: Get a column preset by ID
Get column presets accessible by rsid

404.description: Column Presets for report suite not found.

500.description: Error occurred while retrieving column presets for rsid.

200.description: Column Presets for report suite retrieved successfully.
